system.description:
Prerequisites

STR 13, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.aFfVrifmKKT9Rpzw]{Two-Weapon Melee Fighting}

Benefits

When wielding a double weapon or two weapons (not including unarmed strikes), the character gain a +2 Miscellaneous bonus to DEF, and once per round, the character receives an attack of opportunity on a creature that fails an attack against the character.
system.summary: +2 misc defense in melee when two-weapon fighting
